alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 12:37AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Putnam and central Clay Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1236 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Green Cove Springs to 7 miles north of George`s Lake. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, George`s Lake and Penney Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
